Bow of the Titans

two handed weapon (lvl 8 - unique)

weap id [weapon]: 678 (Bow of the Titans)

(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Armor Piercing [armorpiercing], Piercing Damage [pierce], One Third Strength added [bowstr], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 15A10S to forge (A3S2)

It takes a really strong man to use this very large and exquisitely ornate bow. But a strong man can use the bow to perform the most miraculous shots. He will be able to fire arrows at targets in another province, or use it in combat to fire giant arrows with unlimited range and perfect accuracy.
